actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of September 27, 1944 (58 Stat. 746) an act "To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept property for the Moores Creek National Military Park.'

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire property for the Moores Creek National Military Park. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of September 27, 1944 (58 Stat. 746) an act "To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept property for the Moores Creek National Military Park.'
